Select Word:
123456789.123456789.
123456789.123456789.
Double-click or click-drag mouse to select the last "word" (1-9) on the first row and drag the editor between screens, one scaled and one unscaled.

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxy

tabSize=4, separators: ' ', '.' and '\t'

With tab size 4, the '^abc' strings should occur on every other stop since the string fills exactly one tab stop.
